casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Lavoris Monteiz BATTLE. No. 422P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 11, 2005. Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Lavoris Monteiz Battle. Clark Everett, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of August 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of August 2005."
